volume.description: Volume from 0–100% mapped as 1–1000. Example: V0001 (min)

frequency.description: Frequency in Hz, 1–20000, step a (1st), period a (1 ms). Example: F00001aa (min, 0 time)

clarity.description: First char a-z quality, clarity 0000 (min), last char a-z quality. Example: Caaaaa (min, 0 time)

timbre.description: Grittiness a, tone 0000, modality a, texture a, blend 001 (min, 0 time)

envelope.description: Attack, decay, sustain, release (ms, each 4 digits), all zero. Example: E00000000000000000000 (0 time)

dynamics.description: Five 4-digit values (0–1000), markers a-e. Example: DYNa0000b0000c0000d0000e0000 (0 time)

emotion.description: Five 2-char codes, markers a-e. Example: EMOaAAbAAcAAdAAeAA (neutral/zero time)

arousal.description: Arousal 0–1000, x10 for 0–100%. Example: R0000 (min, 0 time)

perceived_pitch.description: Lowest pitch (20 Hz) padded. Example: PIT00020 (0 time)

noise_texture.description: Frequency 0000 Hz, grain AA (max grain). Example: NOI0000AA (0 time)

modulation.description: Five 4-digit variations (all zeros), pitch shift 000, blend 001. Example: MOD000000000000000000000001001 (0 time)

texture_complexity.description: Scarcity 0000 (full texture), texture type a (monophonic), blend 001. Example: TEX0000a001 (0 time)

harmonicity.description: Class A, subclass a, strength 0, purity 0000. Example: HARAa0000 (0 time)
